findings.details: Category and tag anchor links now resolve to the correct slug targets on archive pages.
Post category/tag links no longer slugify the entire URL, preventing broken /categories# and /tags# anchors.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan for placeholder or http:// links in templates/pages/posts found none.
Category/tag links now point to valid anchors, strengthening internal crawl paths.
Key pages include descriptions/keywords; no obvious placeholders found in recent templates.

recommendations: Verify external links when network access is available
Keep slug generation consistent for archive anchors
